short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts Gmails from Gmail pages and then feeds it to GPT-3, checking for anything suspicious!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Phishing & Malware Detector Gmail - Your Ultimate Email Guardian

In today's digital age, email security is paramount. Protecting your Gmail inbox from phishing attacks and malware threats is not just an option; it's a necessity. Enter AI Phishing & Malware Detector Gmail, the all-in-one Chrome extension that empowers you with cutting-edge technology to keep your Gmail account safe and secure.

How AI Phishing & Malware Detector Gmail Works:

This powerful Chrome extension seamlessly integrates into your Gmail interface, providing you with unparalleled email security features:

Phishing Detection: Our advanced AI algorithms are trained to recognize phishing attempts, even the most sophisticated ones. AI Phishing & Malware Detector Gmail scans every incoming email, flagging suspicious messages and keeping your personal information out of harm's way.

Extracts Email: Simply click a button and extract the email sender, subject, and content onscreen. It is that simple!

User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, this extension is easy to use for all levels of users.

FREE!

All this happens in a click of a button!
